body_html: Hi @t-vi . Thanks for helping in the forum and reporting the bug! I am working on a full refactor of the state of Generators in PyTorch (syed-ahmed@2fd5216) and will be submitting it in the next couple of days. I intend to fix this bug I will include the correct behavior for manual_seed in the new Philox module in my PR and also clear some of the confusions in documentation and asymmetry in the CPU and CUDA generator design in the backend.
body_text: Hi @t-vi . Thanks for helping in the forum and reporting the bug! I am working on a full refactor of the state of Generators in PyTorch (syed-ahmed@2fd5216) and will be submitting it in the next couple of days. I intend to fix this bug I will include the correct behavior for manual_seed in the new Philox module in my PR and also clear some of the confusions in documentation and asymmetry in  the CPU and CUDA generator design in the backend.
body: Hi @t-vi . Thanks for helping in the forum and reporting the bug! I am working on a full refactor of the state of Generators in PyTorch (https://github.com/syed-ahmed/pytorch/commit/2fd52166f0b7ef23b2dde60b6308342cc5184d8a) and will be submitting it in the next couple of days. ~I intend to fix this bug~ I will include the correct behavior for `manual_seed` in the new Philox module in my PR and also clear some of the confusions in documentation and asymmetry in  the CPU and CUDA generator design in the backend.
